lastCommitMessage: chore: update version to 1.0.155 and implement admin role checks
- Bumped version to 1.0.155 with updated build time and commit hash.
- Added user role management methods to IUserPreferences and UserPreferences for retrieving current user roles and checking admin status.
- Enhanced the SplashPage to navigate users based on their roles, directing admins to the admin dashboard and regular users to the home page.
- Updated routing in AppRouter to enforce admin guards on various routes.
These changes improve user role management and enhance navigation based on user permissions.
